text: Heiligenhaus is a town in Mettmann in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is between Düsseldorf and Essen. About 26,500 people live there. == Twin towns == Heiligenhaus is twinned with: * Basildon, England, United Kingdom * Mansfield, England, United Kingdom * Meaux, France * Zwönitz, Germany == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mettmann Rural District
title: Heiligenhaus
